bookmarks.title: GitHub
bookmarks.description: Where the world builds software. Millions of developers and companies build, ship, and maintain their software on GitHub.

bookmarks.title: Stack Overflow
bookmarks.description: The largest, most trusted online community for developers to learn, share their knowledge, and build their careers.

bookmarks.title: MDN Web Docs
bookmarks.description: The MDN Web Docs site provides information about Open Web technologies including HTML, CSS, and APIs for both Web sites and progressive web apps.

bookmarks.title: CSS-Tricks
bookmarks.description: Daily articles about CSS, HTML, JavaScript, and all things related to web design and development.
